original_text: Also, things that are alive do not have the same kind of body. People have one kind of body. Animals have a different kind of body. Birds and fish also have a different kind of body.
korean_text: 육체는 다 같은 육체가 아니니 하나는 사람의 육체요 하나는 짐승의 육체요 하나는 새의 육체요 하나는 물고기의 육체라

sentences.original_text: do not have the same kind of body
sentences.korean_translation: 같은 종류의 몸을 가지고 있지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: People have one kind of body
Animals have a different kind of body
